answers.answer: Hi,From the description of your daughter symptoms,blackouts,falling to her knees,disturbed sleep,......This are symptoms of extreme sensitivity to mycotoxins such as vomitoxin,ochratoxin,aflatoxin.....,spread by spores of fusarium,white mold,blight......Please locate medical doctor in your area  with ability to detect environmental mycotoxins.
I need to know if she had an accident with a possibility of head injury in the past. please this is important.
Has her sugar level been checked for diabetes ?

question: My daughter is 13 and we have been trying to find out for 3 years why she keeps having blackouts. We have had blood tests, EKG's, stress tests, you name it. We can't get an answer that helps. We have heard increase her salt intake, increase her fluid intake, increase her protein. The offical was syncope, but its getting so bad that shes falling to her knees. Shes perfect height 5.7  120 pds. We have an appt with a neuro but 60 plus days out. She also has horrible sleep, always waking up, constant disturbed sleep. We have set for a sleep study also 30 days out. What possible could this be? We just keep getting pushed from one doc to another. I'm terrified she is going to collaspe and hurt herself. Any recommendations appreciated.
title: daughter blacking out
